replies.author: a2605393469
replies.txt_content:
岛屿战争，找到config
跟我下面设置成一样就好了，然后重启服务器， PS:其实我是忘记了那个，所以直接把我的配置发上来了A.A
build-cages: true
ignore-air: false
fill-empty-chests: true
fill-populated-chests: false
use-economy: false
enable-soundeffects: false
chat-handled-by-other-plugin: true
clear-inventory-on-join: true
save-inventory: false
